>I am working with the jUnit plugin for Eclipse.   I can't figure out how 
>to modify the runtime classpath for the launcher.   I am testing J2EE 
>components and need to be able to include various J2EE and application jar 
>files to the Launcher's classpath.

Within your project, try adding to the classpath by choosing  Workbench | 
Preferences | Java -> Classpath Variables.

regards
